title: Kussaba
description: Kussaba, or square patchwork shawl, embroidered.  The ground is scarlet with inserted pieces of different colors which are embroidered in colored silks in a design of floral arabesque, cones, and elongated cones.  Double border, fringed edges.  The general effect is that of a woven shawl.  Parts of border worn away.  lining of black cotton.  #2
